name: Bill's Baked Tofu
instructions: Line a large, rimmed baking sheet with parchment paper to prevent the tofu from sticking.
Drain the tofu and press it out in the sink. Wrap the tofu in a towel, place it on a plate, and put a cast iron skillet on top for 60 to 90 minutes.
In a small Tupperware bowl with a lid add soy sauce, cayenne pepper, paprika, and pressed garlic cloves.
Cube the tofu and put it into a Tupperware bowl with a lid. Add the Tamari and spices, put on the lid and shake.
Put the tofu evenly on the baking sheet.
Bake for 15 minutes, toss the tofu, and bake for 15 minutes more.
